Books.Title: Creeds of Christendom (Vol 1-3)
Books.Author: Philip Schaff
Books.Description: Through Creeds of Christendom, Schaff aims to bring understanding to those who adhere to different creeds. He wisely reminds us that despite varying Christian denominations, Christ always remains at the center of the creeds.

Books.Title: Reformed Confessions of the 16th and 17th Centuries (Vol 1-4)
Books.Author: James T. Dennison Jr
Books.Description: This four volume set compiles numerous Reformed confessions of the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries translated into English. For many of these texts, this is their debut in the Anglo-Saxon vernacular.
